Method Detail

launch

public static void launch(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                          Behavior[] handlers,
                          java.lang.String[] args)
Runs a build

Parameters:
type - A build class defining or inheriting a static CONTROLLERS field
handlers - An array of Behavior objects that control the build, at least one of which must implement the Start interface
args - Parameters for the build
See Also:
